name: Find Ivan
description:
After finding Ivan, bring him to the guy in white in the bottom right corner of the map!Remember I told you about Ivan?
Well, he is going with us

- Jack

You are stranded on a huge fair with a single goal in mind - Find Ivan. The time is short and there is definitely more than one guy named Ivan in this crowd, so you need to think fast. Ask people for clues and track down the right Ivan!

Controls

  • Mouse Click to move
  • Click on people to talk to them
  • Use the list on the right to track all the clues you've gathered so far
  • Remove obsolete clues from the list by clicking on them

Credits

  • Visuals by https://raindrinker.itch.io/
  • Music was generated using https://www.strofe.com/create
